No Poverty.reason: The course focuses on pension systems and financial planning to prevent funding gaps for the elderly, a key mechanism to prevent old-age poverty.
evidence: 退休金制度管理
分析老人所需要的理財規劃與資金缺口
協助消費者做好退休理財規劃

Good Health and Well-being.reason: Directly addresses the health needs of an aging population by analyzing "老人醫療長照制度" (elderly medical and long-term care systems) and related retirement needs.
evidence: 老人醫療長照制度
高齡醫療與長期照護制度
長照制度的發展與退休需求之未來發展

Quality Education.reason: Aims to train "退休理財專業人才" (professional talent in retirement financial planning) and provides a pathway to professional RFA and CFP® certifications.
evidence: 為提升台灣退休理財專業人才之培訓
培育同學對退休理財規劃的專業知識與能力
同學修完此課程後可取得RFA完成培訓之資格

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Discusses "勞工退休金與員工福利" (labor pensions and employee benefits), which are integral to decent work, and trains professionals for the financial sector.
evidence: 勞工退休金與員工福利
協助企業雇主進行退休金規畫與教育
培育同學對退休理財規劃的專業知識與能力

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Focuses on the financial industry, including the "金融保險退休市場" (financial insurance retirement market) and designing innovative "退休商品" (retirement products).
evidence: 金融保險退休市場相關專業理論基礎
協助金融機構行銷或設計退休商品
分析金融市場相關退休理財商品

Reduced Inequalities.reason: Addresses inequality through the study of "政府退休金制度" (government pension systems) and "年金改革" (annuity reform), which are policies for income security in old age.
evidence: 政府退休金制度
台灣年金制度改革現況與未來方向
代際資產移轉和稅務規劃

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Examines the governance of public institutions through topics like "政府退休金制度" (government pension systems) and "年金制度改革" (annuity system reform).
evidence: 政府退休金制度
台灣年金制度改革現況與未來方向
協助政府退休基金管理退休基金

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course is a partnership with the "中華民國退休基金協會" (Retirement Funds Association) to provide professional certification, linking academia with a professional body.
evidence: 本課程已獲准成為中華民國退休基金協會「退休理財規劃顧問(RFA)」認證課程之培訓課程
